description:
In the year 2130 — after World War III — large contaminated areas known as Black Spots, sites of bombing, pockmarked the landmasses. One such area, devastating the centre of Tokyo, was quarantined off by large walls. Years after the war inhabitants deemed to be "unneeded" started to populate the wasteland. But among the survivors came forth those who defined themselves by their supernatural abilities — fire, wind, water, gravity, speed, strength, etc. Fearful of their powers, those in power sought to manipulate and hunt down these Needless.
Source: mangaupdates.com

REGULAR.description:
After an attack on an evil corporation, a young rebel`s sister is killed. Now alone, Cruz is taken in by a band of mutants with strange and amazing powers called the Needless.
Source: HIDIVE

Eve and Blade force Cruz to do their shopping, but Eve has to drag him out again to get it right. While searching for the elusive Super Gel Dero Doro beverage, they run into Uten, one of Simeon`s four strongest members. "It`s magic!", or is it? What is the nature of Uten`s Needless ability, and just how immodest can Eve`s uniform get before this anime gets re-rated? Burning questions, dubious answers - they`re all here.

titles.title: イヴ・ノイシュヴァンシュタイン

REGULAR.description:
A brutish stranger shows up at the church looking for Adam. Once Teruyama finds Adam Blade, the two engage in a battle that tests the limits of both of their powers.
Source: HIDIVE

Adam Arclight continues Needless hunting with renewed vengeance. Primaria alerts him that they`ve found the perfect donor for Adam to survive.
Source: HIDIVE

As they enter Iron Mountain, Blade and his team are aided by a tiny technical marvel named Disc. The fortress is broken into by a trio of deadly assassins named Girl Squadron.
Source: HIDIVE

The shameless wardrobe malfunctions enter high gear as the Pretty Girls track the escaping Eve into the warlord governor`s mansion. The property is protected by Goldy Locks security, where everything`s over the top and out the hatch. Meanwhile, the rest of the team gets ready to mount a rescue mission but is interrupted by an important announcement.

Mio, Kuchinashi, and Setsuna are challenged by the duet of Nanami and Misaki to see which group will get to represent the Pretty Girl Squad at the upcoming Simeon Grand Opening ceremony. Riru assigns them both a pointless side quest to complete in order to determine the winner. Meanwhile, Blade`s group fails to surreptitiously infiltrate the Opening Day ceremony. Naturally, they fail in the most conspicuous of ways. Oh, and pics...or it didn`t happen.

titles.title: アダム・アークライト

REGULAR.description:
At last Adam Arclight finds the body he needs, that of Adam Blade. However, Blade isn`t going to go down without the fight of a lifetime.
Source: HIDIVE

After temporarily thwarting Adam Arclight`s evil plan, the team tries to regroup and recharge, but the Girl Squadron has Blade trapped!
Source: HIDIVE

Cruz discovers that Blade was not always traveling with Gido and Eve. He hears about Blade`s former companions, Set and Solva.
Source: HIDIVE

The Girl Squadron still has Blade in their trap. To ensure certain victory, they introduce two deadly new additions to their evil trio, and one of them may just do the trick.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: ブラック・アトラクション

REGULAR.description:
Just as Girls Squadron increases their attacks, Cruz remembers what Eve taught him, and makes a powerful discovery that could save them all.
Source: HIDIVE

Disc believes there may be a way to use Kurumi to save Eve from the Girls Squadron brainwashing. As the mission commences, Kuchinashi provides a surprise.
Source: HIDIVE

Kuchinashi releases her most powerful weapon yet, the Lilith Temptation, which grants everyone the ability to see what they most desire.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: リリス・テンプテーション

REGULAR.description:
Left alone to confront Blade and his comrades, Saten reveals his fragment, but this revelation is nothing compared to what Saten truly shows them: the Fourth Great One.
Source: HIDIVE

As Saten and the Fourth Great One continue to battle Blade and his team, Cruz and Disc decipher just how Saten can possess what appears to be more than one power Fragment.
Source: HIDIVE

As Cruz fades into unconsciousness, he begins to remember their early days in the resistance. He recalls the locket, and the warning to always keep it close.
Source: HIDIVE

Disc continues to try to save Cruz, but he hovers between life and death. As he fights for his life, Aruka and Saten try to destroy Blade and his team once and for all.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: アグニッシュワッタス

REGULAR.description:
Just as Cruz is regaining full consciousness again, Aruka pulls out a trump card. However, the last person anyone would suspect of helping the Resistance comes to their aid.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: ポジティブフィードバック・ゼロ

REGULAR.description:
In a last ditch effort to prevent Arclight from stealing his body, Blade attempts to rob Arclight of his powers. Meanwhile, the origins of the Adam Project are discovered.
Source: HIDIVE

"Adam" Blade is introduced to his partner, "Eve" and the scientists behind the Adam Project can only hope for the best.
Source: HIDIVE

As Arclight attempts to fulfill his destiny, Blade unleashes his most powerful attack yet. However, even Riru is powerless to stop Saten as he tries to achieve his own plans.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 666人委員会(トリプルシックス)

REGULAR.description:
Standing where it all began, Saten announces how his rule will commence. As he lays out his plan, he reveals he will have a surpring partner in this new world order.
Source: HIDIVE

Arclight makes his final attempt to ascend to the throne of the universe. Blade steps up to stop him and save everyone before Arclight`s power grows too great.
Source: HIDIVE
